tags.name: zui-button-dropdown
tags.description: A component that uses a `<zui-button>` to open a dropdown menu of options.

attributes.name: open
attributes.description: This attribute will decide whether the submenu is open or not

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: This attribute will decide whether you want to disable the `<zui-button>` dropdown trigger

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Use this attribute to set the type of button dropdown you want. Options: `primary`, `secondary`, `link`, and `danger`; can be used in combination with `icon`. See [Buttons](https://zui.zywave.com/components/buttons/) for button style variations.

properties.name: open
properties.description: This attribute will decide whether the submenu is open or not

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: This attribute will decide whether you want to disable the `<zui-button>` dropdown trigger

properties.name: type
properties.description: Use this attribute to set the type of button dropdown you want. Options: `primary`, `secondary`, `link`, and `danger`; can be used in combination with `icon`. See [Buttons](https://zui.zywave.com/components/buttons/) for button style variations.

slots.description: Unnamed slot, for text seen within the `<zui-button>` dropdown trigger

slots.name: option
slots.description: For each dropdown menu option, apply this slot attribute to your slotted menu item

cssParts.name: menu
cssParts.description: The menu container for the dropdown menu, this is exposed as a shadow part and can be accessed with ::part(menu)
